description: This file defines an AuthService class that handles user registration and login logic in a backend service, utilizing a UserRepository for data access and BCrypt for password hashing.

classes.name: AuthService
classes.description: Service layer for managing user authentication processes, such as registration and login.

methods.name: register
methods.description: Registers a new user with provided email, display name, and password after verifying email uniqueness.

methods.name: login
methods.description: Authenticates a user based on email and password, returning an Optional User object.
